stx.ds.plus.Show

type
class
...

Static Methods

getShowFor<T>(t : T) : stx.ShowFunction<T>

Returns a ShowFunction (T -> String). It works for any type. For Custom Classes you must provide a toString() method, otherwise the full class name is returned.

getShowForType<T>(v : ValueType) : stx.ShowFunction<T>

@:todo Reflect.fields doesn't work consistenly across platforms so we may probably pass to use Type.getInstanceFields. The problem here is that we must check if the fields are functions before grabbing the value.
